Telemetry to be effective for

everything in the system needs to

that is

Telemetry is not just vendor neutral it
is implementation neutral from its
Inception open Telemetry has been
designed to decouple the Cross cutting
aspects of telemetry which are your
semantic conventions and your API from
the underlying implementation what that
what that means to you as an end user is
that you can rely on the otel API across
your whole code base with no other

get to configure your application you

no effects it just doesn't process or or

application with or your library with uh
with open Telemetry you rely on the otel

decision between supporting one client
or another client you just simply use
the oal API and let your end users
decide what to do with that Telemetry
because even though open Telemetry
